tool_description: Scan MRZ from Passports documents and send the result back as JSON string.
title: Passport MRZ Extract

api_list.name: Send Image with URL
api_list.description: GET Passport MRZ by sending document image as a image_url

required_parameters.name: image_url
required_parameters.description:
**Use our Text Analyze API to detect & extract MRZ from passport pictures .**

*Image must be a regular JPEG or PNG image. Usually such images have extensions: .jpg, .jpeg, .png. The service checks input file by MIME type â€¦
